an10.220:1: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi. Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an10.220:2: "Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī"ti?
an10.220:3: "Na kho ahaṁ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi. Sādhu me bhavaṁ gotamo tathā dhammaṁ desetu yathāhaṁ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājāneyyan"ti.
an10.220:4: "Tividhā kho, brāhmaṇa, kāyena adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti; catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti; tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti.
an10.220:5: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti … pe … evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena adhammacariyā visamacariyā hoti.
an10.220:6: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti … pe … evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti.
an10.220:7: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti … pe … evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti. Evaṁ adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
an10.220:8: Tividhā, brāhmaṇa, kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti; catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti; tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
an10.220:9: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti … pe … evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
an10.220:10: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti … pe … evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
an10.220:11: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti … pe … evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti. Evaṁ dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī"ti.
an10.220:12: "Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama … pe … upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan"ti.
